An immersive theatrical experience where audience members wear special glasses that project a 360-degree virtual environment, creating the illusion of an invisible elephant in the room.

A public art installation featuring a series of oversized, transparent sculptures of elephants that change colors and patterns based on the emotions of passersby, reflecting the collective emotional state of the community.
A virtual reality game where players are tasked with navigating an elephant through a series of increasingly complex mazes, with the goal of unlocking hidden paths and discovering hidden secrets.
A series of interactive workshops where participants create their own invisible elephant-inspired art pieces using a variety of mediums, such as painting, sculpture, and performance art.
A collaborative, interactive website that allows users to create and share their own invisible elephant stories, using a combination of text, images, and video.
